system.description: Effect: All valid targets are covered in a flammable Powder for 5 activations. If a creature covered in Powder attempts to use a Fire-typed move, the attack fails and they deal 4 Ticks of their HP as damage to themselves and all adjacent creatures. If a creature covered in Powder is hit by a Fire-type move, they deal 4 Ticks of their HP as damage to themselves and all adjacent creatures.
